text:
Confederation of Government Employees Association Delhi (CGEAD) is a government employees union recognized by Delhi government that represents employees serving under various departments of Delhi government.
History.
CGEAD was established in the last decade of 20th century as a trades union and was recognized by Delhi government in 2018.
Office bearers.
Ajay Veer Yadav serves as the General Secretary of Confederation of Government Employees Association Delhi (CGEAD).
